name: Off World
description:
Off World

The Druuga conquered your world and their armies controlled the surrounding systems. Guide your colony ship toward a free future and defend it with your life. It might not be a combat vessel, but your engine's vapor trail tears through the armor of enemy ships.

Features
  • 3D Graphics
  • Customize Your Craft Through Mods
  • Fast Paced wave / tower defense combat
  • Vintage look, like an old Sci-Fi flick
